alert.note: Alert for Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 11:58AM AKST until January 24 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TUESDAY... ...BLIZZARD WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Windy with blowing snow, low visibility and very cold wind chills to 40 below, and areas of low visibility. North winds gusting to 35 mph. * WHERE...Yukon Delta. * WHEN...Until noon AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult conditions. Blowing snow will cause low visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 40 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and lowest visibility in blowing snow are along the Coast. Cold wind chills are occuring across the area.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas.
